#### Commercial Bakers

#### Industrial Bakers

# Supplying Quality Baking Equipment for Bakeries & Restaurants

Your bakery equipment is the bread and butter of your business, and you can’t
afford to compromise on quality. At Dough Tech, we are experts in commercial,
retail and industrial baking equipment.

We represent the world’s most-respected manufacturers, including Escher
mixers. Contact us for assistance with dough mixers, spiral mixers, bread
moulders, sheeters, proofers, water meters, oven racks and more.

Whether you have a small boutique bakery, a medium-to-large operation or you
deal in the industrial bakery industry, our team can assist you in selecting
the right baking equipment to achieve your goals and stay within your budget.

For almost two decades, we have provided our customers with exceptional
service and value. We also provide a full range of repair and maintenance
services for bakers and other customers. Trust the Dough Tech team for the
industry’s highest-quality baking equipment and value-added customer service
and support.

### A Little About Us

Since 2002, we have helped our customers find the correct bakery equipment for
their needs and we will continue helping our customers by being at the
forefront of industry leading equipment. We are local, national and
international distributors and manufacturers of some of the best baking
equipment in the world, and that we are proud of.

### Why Dough Tech?

We are experts in the field of bakery equipment and service. Our values
include being family-oriented, hard working, experienced, humble,
understanding, honest and open. We value our relationships with our customers
and will do our best to help our customers in any way possible, long after a
purchase is made, to help.

### We’re Knowledgable

We have been in the business for quite a while and we know a thing or two
about baking equipment.

### Contact Us

See something you like? Please feel free to contact us anytime to discuss
pricing and/or financing.

National distributor of

### DAUB Dough Divider Rounders

We are proud to be a distributor for DAUB dough divider rounders

#### Semi-automatic divider rounders

The state-of-the-art Daub semi-automatic DR-Flex treat the dough gently. Dough
distribution takes place in a smooth movement with powerful rounding motion
producing perfect round rolls every time.

DR-FLEX

#### Automatic divider rounders

All Daub Divider Rounders are equipped with a unique easy forward-tilting
system that lifts the dividing disc forward for easy cleaning.

DR-Robot

We are a national distributor of

### Escher Mixers

Dough Tech has fixed bowl and large scale Escher mixers. We have supplied some
of the biggest names in bread making with these powerhouse machines.

#### Retail Mixers

Escher’s complete line of two speed fixed bowl spiral mixers are designed for
high gluten flour and are suitable for retail and wholesale bakeries that
produce all types of dough. Standard features include a reinforced frame,
spiral mixing tools and drive system.

Retail

#### Industrial Mixers

Removable bowl spiral mixers are available from 80-600kg capacity. Escher
mixers’ robust design are intended for constant use in wholesale and
industrial applications. From single tool spirals to double tool wendel, we
can mix anything

Industrial
